name: reimplantation
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the act of fixing something, especially a part of the body, back in the place where it was before: The reimplantation of the pacemaker was performed successfully. Early re-implantation of teeth gives the best chance of long-term success. Related word
reimplant
More examplesFewer examplesThey developed new techniques for preserving organs between removal and reimplantation.Reimplantation of the tissue carries a low risk of reintroducing cancer cells.The standard surgical procedure for this condition is the removal and reimplantation of the affected organ.
